project.name: J-C036A-JENA-10-ST03-DT03-DF18-CF20-01
project.description: The software uses external input to construct a pathname that should be within a restricted directory, but it does not neutralize absolute path sequences such as '/abs/path' that can resolve to a location that is outside of that directory. This test takes in a filename to read. Since the provided filename isn't checked to ensure it doesn't contain an absolute path, it allows reading of any file on the system.

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="/etc/passwd" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="/etc/group" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-02 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_kX5Qs2lV3BVKK9sl7JiA AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (etc_passwd_line_pattern_7bebCbgqT7 OR etc_passwd_root_user_KSESq1elH5 OR etc_group_line_pattern_LAS5zuFVXp) AND NOT timeout_BWnznT8ECk) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((etc_passwd_line_pattern_7bebCbgqT7 OR etc_passwd_root_user_KSESq1elH5 OR etc_group_line_pattern_LAS5zuFVXp) OR timeout_BWnznT8ECk OR controlled_exit_8HVLspYG5r)))
